summary: In Los Angeles, a fallen soldier who has joined the ranks of the living dead reunites with his best friend in order to deal with the city's drug dealers and killers - a perfect way to collect the blood that one of them so desperately needs.
cast: David Anders|Chris Wylde|Louise Griffiths|Jacy King|Eric Payne|Bernardo Badillo|Theda Reichman|Richard Reichman|Wally White|Floyd Van Buskirk|Mark Elias|Zoë Simpson Dean|David St. James|Frante Foggie|Kevin Lyons|Aaron Kahn|Ken Martin|Scott Hoover|Ashley-Elizabeth Green|Joe Dioletto|Matthew Serrano|Felina Britton|Jensen Liu|Alberto Santillán|Stacy Glassgold|Yvette Freeman|Ralph Richeson|Robert Axelrod|Mike Rad|Emiliano Torres|Mike G.|Ruben Ferrer|Vinni Ali'l Mesa|Grifon Aldren|Clint Jung|Cathy Shim|Twain Taylor|David Ury|Beau Clark|Tina-Elena Martinez|Jennifer Holloway|Andre Alexsen|Jonathan Mangum|Kristyn Burtt|Jen Gentile|David Ross Paterson|Amy Correa|Ciro Suarez|Colin Follenweider|Braxton Davis|Bobby King|Marque Ohmes|Annie Abbott|Ben Lin|John Maynard|Don Pugsley|Philipp Lawrence Durand|Marcia Loring|Jeff Rector|Codaway King|William Conboy|Jay Hausman|Grant Sholders|Jerry Pennington|Ron Smith|Catalina Filip|Martha Beaver|Darius Gutridge|Buakai Tonyala|Johnny Surinarinte|Stephen Dewindt|George Beavers|Dorothy Chechi|Zettie Ronistal|Leticia Vazquez|Anwar Junied|Luz Landeros|June Avilez|Jorge Aguirre|Kraig Smith|Raffi Rapelian|Harold Land|Demetrios Prevezanos|Terry Sartin|Jackson Dowd|Jamieson Dowd|Arthur Ocull|Dale Hendon|Michael Rosanova|Brice Harris|Katie Horning|Ryan Harrison|Anne Arles|Suzan Averitt|Brooke Bickford|Don Dunn

title: The Revenant
